message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 400k, a good starting point. Your turn to negotiate!
I'll meet you halfway, but I want a bit more. Your turn to counter!
I'll give you 300k, but I think I deserve more after your last offer. Your turn to think again!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away the farm. Let's see if you can do better!
I'll give you 250k, but I think I'm getting close to my target. Don't underestimate me!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken for a ride. Let's see if you can make a better offer!
